title: The Triple Fool - dissemination of "such songs"

content.question: In the second stanza, the dissemination of “such songs” (line 19) leads to which of the following?

choices.label: A renewal of the speaker's sorrow
The ridicule of the speaker's love by others
An improvement in the speaker's reputation as a poet
A validation of the speaker's poetic intentions

content.answer: A renewal of the speaker's sorrow

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
